name: LittList
description: Et verktøy for å lage litteraturlistegenerator på under 10 sekunder.

scripts.test: if [ $TRAVIS ]; then npm run-script unit-test; npm run-script integration-test; else npm run-script unit-test-dot; fi
scripts.integration-test: node web/server.js & echo "Starting server."; casperjs test test/integration/*.js --fail-fast; kill -9 $! || true

author: Michael McMillan <email@michaelmcmillan.net> (http://michaelmcmillan.net)
